summary: An entity's steadfastness and resilience allowed it to withstand relentless challenges, demonstrating the power of enduring strength."
Continuous and unwavering persistence enabled an entity to remain unshaken despite constant and aggressive external pressures."
The temporary fury of natural forces eventually subsided, highlighting the transient nature of such challenges compared to enduring strength."
An entity's inner strength and deeply rooted foundation provided stability and protection against external turmoil."
